description: This file defines a web page for troubleshooting reset and restore operations on a gateway device, including associated JavaScript for user interactions and form elements for different reboot/restore actions.

methods.name: setResetInfo
methods.description: Sends an asynchronous request to trigger a reset or restore operation based on user input, and manages progress indicators and page reloads.

methods.name: checkForRebooting
methods.description: Checks periodically if the device has rebooted by pinging the index page and redirects to login upon success.
